name: @hyperscape/physx-js-webidl
description: Node.js-compatible Javascript/WASM bindings for Nvidia PhysX 5.6.0
author: fabmax

scripts.prebuild: [ -f dist/physx-js-webidl.js ] && [ -f dist/physx-js-webidl.wasm ] && [ -f dist/physx-js-webidl.d.ts ] && echo 'PhysX already built, skipping...' || ( [ -f ../hyperscape/src/server/public/physx-js-webidl.js ] && [ -f ../hyperscape/src/server/public/physx-js-webidl.wasm ] && mkdir -p dist && cp ../hyperscape/src/server/public/physx-js-webidl.js dist/ && cp ../hyperscape/src/server/public/physx-js-webidl.wasm dist/ && ( [ -f types/physx-js-webidl.d.ts ] && cp types/physx-js-webidl.d.ts dist/ || true ) && echo 'Copied prebuilt PhysX files' || bash ./make.sh )
scripts.build: [ -f dist/physx-js-webidl.js ] && [ -f dist/physx-js-webidl.wasm ] && [ -f dist/physx-js-webidl.d.ts ] && echo 'PhysX already built, skipping...' || bash ./make.sh
